title_teim: The twenty eighth annual induction ceremony. 2013. Part 1 of 2. Final delivery master.
title_ssm: The twenty eighth annual induction ceremony. 2013. Part 1 of 2. Final delivery master.
title_si: The twenty eighth annual induction ceremony. 2013. Part 1 of 2. Final delivery master.
label_teim: Tenth Planet Productions. 2013 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Introduction, Part 1 of 2, Final delivery master
label_ssm: Tenth Planet Productions. 2013 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Introduction, Part 1 of 2, Final delivery master
summary_teim: The beginning of the twenty eighth annual induction ceremony. Randy Newman, Albert King, Lou Adler, Donna Summer, Heart and Quincy Jones are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
summary_ssm: The beginning of the twenty eighth annual induction ceremony. Randy Newman, Albert King, Lou Adler, Donna Summer, Heart and Quincy Jones are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
contents_teim: Randy Newman performs I love LA with Tom Petty, Jackson Browne, and John Fogerty--Randy Newman clip reel--Don Henley inducts Randy Newman--Randy Newman's acceptance speech--Randy Newman performs I think its going to rain today and then performs I'm dead but I don't know it with Don Henley--Albert King clip reel--John Mayer inducts Albert King--King's daughter and granddaughter acceptance speech--Gary Clark Jr. performs Oh pretty woman and then performs Born under a bad sign with Booker T. Jones and John Mayer--Lou Adler clip reel--Cheech and Chong induct Lou Adler--Lou Adler's acceptance speech--Carole King performs So far away--Donna Summer clip reel--Kelly Rowland inducts Donna Summer--Summer's husband and three daughters acceptance speech--Jennifer Hudson performs Last Dance--Heart clip reel--Chris Cornell inducts Heart--Heart acceptance speeches--Heart performs Crazy on you--Heart performs Barracuda with Jerry Cantrell, Chris Cornell, and Mike McCready--Quincy Jones clip reel--Oprah Winfrey inducts Quincy Jones--Quincy Jones acceptance speech--Usher performs Rock with you--beginning of In memoriam reel
contents_ssm: Randy Newman performs I love LA with Tom Petty, Jackson Browne, and John Fogerty--Randy Newman clip reel--Don Henley inducts Randy Newman--Randy Newman's acceptance speech--Randy Newman performs I think its going to rain today and then performs I'm dead but I don't know it with Don Henley--Albert King clip reel--John Mayer inducts Albert King--King's daughter and granddaughter acceptance speech--Gary Clark Jr. performs Oh pretty woman and then performs Born under a bad sign with Booker T. Jones and John Mayer--Lou Adler clip reel--Cheech and Chong induct Lou Adler--Lou Adler's acceptance speech--Carole King performs So far away--Donna Summer clip reel--Kelly Rowland inducts Donna Summer--Summer's husband and three daughters acceptance speech--Jennifer Hudson performs Last Dance--Heart clip reel--Chris Cornell inducts Heart--Heart acceptance speeches--Heart performs Crazy on you--Heart performs Barracuda with Jerry Cantrell, Chris Cornell, and Mike McCready--Quincy Jones clip reel--Oprah Winfrey inducts Quincy Jones--Quincy Jones acceptance speech--Usher performs Rock with you--beginning of In memoriam reel

abstract_ssm: At 2013 Induction Ceremony -- I Love LA (Randy Newman with Tom Petty, Jackson Browne, and John Fogerty)-- Video montage of Randy Newman--Don Henley inducts Randy Newman--Randy Newman acceps award-- I Think its Going to Rain Today; I'm Dead but I Don't Know It (Randy Newman with Don Henley)--Video montage of Albert King--John Mayer inducts Albert King--King's daughter and granddaughter accept award on his behalf-- Oh Pretty Woman; Born Under a Bad Sign (Gary Clark Jr. with Booker T. Jones and John Mayer)--Video montage of Lou Adler--Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong induct Lou Adler--Lou Adler accepts his award--So Far Way (Carole King)--Video montage of Donna Summer--Kelly Rowland inducts Donna Summer--Summer's husband, Bruce, and three daughters accept award on her behalf--Last Dance (Jennifer Hudson)--Video montage of Heart--Chris Cornell inducts Heart--Members of Heart accept their awards--Crazy on You (Heart)--Barracuda (Heart with Jerry Cantrell, Chris Cornell, and Mike McCready)--Video montage of Quincy Jones--Oprah Winfrey inducts Quincy Jones--Quincy Jones accepts award--Rock with You (Usher)--Video montage of In Memoriam segment (clip ends)
